definitions.definition: Someone who interferes with others; one who is nosy , intrusive or meddlesome .
A device consisting of three mirrors that, when attached to the wall of a house, allows an occupant to see who is at the front door without a direct line of sight.

main_definition: Someone who interferes with others; one who is nosy , intrusive or meddlesome .
secondary_definitions: A device consisting of three mirrors that, when attached to the wall of a house, allows an occupant to see who is at the front door without a direct line of sight.
